name: Spawning (VMJ2020 5of10)
description:
A Sokoban variant. You are a chicken who cannot stop laying eggs. You can restart but not undo. There are 4 puzzles.

Read the README for instructions

I've been busy with other stuff lately so it was nice to have something come together quickly. I couldn't think of anything for theme 4 so I just skipped ahead to 5, though I'd like to go back if I can.

I'm not super happy with the puzzles here and I haven't thought enough/am not experienced enough to be able to articulate why. I guess the things that are notable about them are very situational or otherwise wouldn't be so interesting from a player's perspective.
